devdoc.details: The proxies are deployed normally and not cloned to minimize the gas cost overhead while using them to read data feed values
devdoc.title: Contract factory that deterministically deploys proxies that read data feeds (Beacons or Beacon sets) or dAPIs, along with optional OEV support

computeDapiProxyAddress(bytes32,bytes).notice: Computes the address of the dAPI proxy

computeDapiProxyWithOevAddress(bytes32,a.notice: Computes the address of the dAPI proxy with OEV support

computeDataFeedProxyAddress(bytes32,byte.notice: Computes the address of the data feed proxy

computeDataFeedProxyWithOevAddress(bytes.notice: Computes the address of the data feed proxy with OEV support

deployDapiProxyWithOev(bytes32,address,b.notice: Deterministically deploys a dAPI proxy with OEV support

deployDataFeedProxy(bytes32,bytes).notice: Deterministically deploys a data feed proxy

deployDataFeedProxyWithOev(bytes32,addre.notice: Deterministically deploys a data feed proxy with OEV support
